metadata.title: CVE-2024-31392 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: If an insecure element was added to a page after a delay, Firefox would notreplace the secure icon with a mixed content security status Thisvulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 124.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
